original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary:
"FDA Warns of Radioactive Shrimp in Walmart's Great Value Brand: Potentially contaminated frozen shrimp imported by PT. Bahari Makmur Sejati (BMS Foods) may contain cesium-137, a radioactive isotope that can cause DNA damage and increase cancer risk. The FDA has urged consumers not to consume, sell, or serve the affected shrimp, and Walmart has removed it from stores."

"Israel Launches Attack on Gaza City: The Israeli military has begun operations to take over Gaza City, with the aim of achieving full Israeli control of Gaza. The operation, approved by the security cabinet two weeks ago, is expected to present its plan for the capture of Gaza City to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday."</s>
